info.description: This API is the main entry point for creating, editing and publishing analytics throught the Presalytics API
info.title: Story

get.description: Returns a list of stories for this user identifie via the access token presentated to the api

200.description: List of stories for this user

get.summary: Story: Get List of User Stories

post.description: Upload new story to presalytics api
An endpoint for Presalytics Renderers to cache html subdocuments for subsequent retrieval by the browser.  Documents Are retrieved via token expire after 1 minute.

requestBody.description: parameters to identify an update a collaborator across multiple stories

get.description: An endpoint for broswer retreive html documents that were cached durin the rendering process via a nonce (token)

schema.description: html document with a link to the login page
schema.title: Login Button

200.description: A cached html subdocument (typically loaded via iframe)

post.description: Allows for bulk updates on collaborator metadata.  Restricted to internal admins

requestBody.description: parameters to identify an update a collaborator across multiple stories

200.description: Array of all possible permission types

get.description: pass rendering metadata to the client-side scripts

post.description: Upload new story to presalytics api via an Open Office Xml file

schema.description: A pptx or xlsx object from which to start creation of a story
schema.title: Open Office Xml document (e.g., xlsx, pptx file)

requestBody.description: A pptx or xlsx file upload or story outline json object

post.description: Upload new story to presalytics api via an Open Office Xml file

requestBody.description: A json-formatted object that includes a base64 encoded file (file encoded utf-8)

get.description: json-formatted version of this spec with the tags removed to help with codegen processes
Json Schema for validating Story Outline objects

delete.description: Remove a session and dependant data.

get.description: Get session metadata
Get data for all views in a session

post.description: Create a page view object for a viewing session

schema.title: Required parameters to create a view

requestBody.description: Collaborator user id and permission type

delete.description: Remove a view and dependant data.

get.description: Get view meta data

delete.description: Remove a story and dependant data.

get.description: Returns story metadata, inlcuding json object with story outline

put.description: Update story metadata, including story outline

get.description: returns an html document containing session and event metrics for the story

schema.description: html document with reveal.js presenation of story

schema.description: html document with a link to the login page
schema.title: Login Button

get.description: Gets a list users that can read or edit this story

200.description: List of collaborators on the story

post.description: Add a colloborator to this story

requestBody.description: Collaborator user id and permission type

get.description: Check whether user have certain types of permissions.  Use http status codes to understand if permission is granted - 204 = Granted, 403 = Forbidden

parameters.description: the type of permission requested.  can be a permission_type object name (e.g., owner, editor, create, viewer, admin) or a permission type field (e.g., can_edit, can_view, can_add_collaborators, can_delete)
parameters.name: permissiontype

get.summary: Permissions: Story Authorization for a User

post.description: Edit story permissions for inactive users.  Requires admin rights.

requestBody.description: Collaborator user id and permission type

post.summary: Story Collaborators: Edit Inactive User Permission

delete.description: Remove a collaborator from this story

get.description: Data to help you understand the access rights of a particular collaborator on this story

put.description: Modify a user's access right to this story (e.g., grant edit permissions)

requestBody.description: Collaborator user id (presalytics userid) and permission type

get.description: Get a list of Events available to users of this story

post.description: Add a message to the Story's conversation

requestBody.description: Collaborator user id and permission type

200.description: A repsonse to the requested action

get.description: Redtreives updated story as open office xml file (e.g., .pptx, .docx, .xlsx)

200.description: The latest versiono of the story, in its orginal file format

get.description: Get a list of messages that have been send in this story

post.description: Add a message to the Story's conversation

get.description: Returns Story's outline

200.description: An html document containing a reveal.js represenation of the story

schema.title: Login Button

get.summary: Story: Get Story at Reveal.js Document

get.description: Get a list of sessions asscoaited with this story

requestBody.description: Collaborator user id and permission type

get.description: Returns code indicating whether story has active running background and is healthy (e.g., the latest outline is valid)

d3_id.description: A d3 figure id from a D3Widget instance in the Presaltyics Python Library
d3_id.name: d3_id

figure_id.description: A matplotlib figure id from a MatplotlibResponsiveFigure instance in the Presaltyics Python Library
figure_id.name: figure_id

full.description: Pull a story object with associated collaborator user, permission, and session data(faster if cached from prior api call)
full.name: full

id.description: the id from the story object
id.name: id

include_outline.description: Determines whether a repsonse including story objects should include the story outline.  Defaults to true. Useful for speeding up processing times.
include_outline.name: include_outline

include_relationships.description: Indicate whether the returned object should include child relationships
include_relationships.name: include_relationships

nonce.description: A one-time use token for retieving items in the users cache
nonce.name: nonce

obsolete_id.description: A primary key pointing to an obsolete item in the story. Item type is context-dependent
obsolete_id.name: obsolete_id

ooxml_automation_id.description: the id of the ooxml_automation object
ooxml_automation_id.name: ooxml_automation_id

permissiontype.description: The type of access required.  Must match - admin, owner, editor, viewer
permissiontype.name: permissiontype

refresh_cache.description: Force the api reload the `Story full` object
refresh_cache.name: refresh_cache

replace_existing.description: Indicates whether a put or post method would replace the existing contents
replace_existing.name: replace_existing

schema_version.description: The semanitic version of a schema (e.g. '0.3.1')
schema_version.name: schema_version

session_id.description: The primary key for a view session
session_id.name: session_id

story_collaborator_userid.description: The presalytics userid (NOT the Id of the story_collaborator object)
story_collaborator_userid.name: story_collaborator_userid

view_id.description: The primary key for a page view within a session
view_id.name: view_id

add_new_collaborator_request.description: required subset of collaborator data to get a permission
add_new_collaborator_request.title: Collaborator permission data

collaborator_bulk_update_request.description: allows for bulk updating of user_ids and active status based on a lead id or user_id
collaborator_bulk_update_request.title: Collaborator data to change

create_session_request.description: Request body for creating a session
create_session_request.title: session-create

modify_inactive_collaborator.description: Action can be either "delete" or "activate".  Either lead_id or user_id is required.  user_id takes precedence.
modify_inactive_collaborator.title: Collaborator permission data

ooxml_document.description: A reference to an Ooxml Automation Document from the Presalytics Ooxml Automation API
ooxml_document.title: Ooxml Document

permission_type.description: A permission type that can be applied to story collaborator
permission_type.title: Permission Type

session.description: A user session with an open story
session.title: Session

story_collaborator.description: Description of a user that can collaborate on a story
story_collaborator.title: Story Collaborator

story_outline_history.description: A revision repository for story outlines
story_outline_history.title: Story Outline History

view.description: A Page view within a session-create
view.title: View
